query: WITH entities AS (SELECT committee_id, policy_id, id FROM approval_processes WHERE ((committee_id = ANY($1)) AND (COALESCE((policy_id, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY policy_id ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: ApprovalProcessId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN approval_process_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.policy_id asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
